author: slava77
body:
these were collected from the valgrind report for "step3" run with a 2017 workflow with PU (10211).

The change in DQM/SiPixelPhase1Common/interface/GeometryInterface.h actually didn't fix anything, but it still looks useful.

Local short matrix run shows no differences.
title: cleanup uninitialized reads or conditions and leaks
